short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab Chrome extension that brings daily inspiration through iconic basketball quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dunk into daily inspiration with BasketBoost, the Chrome extension that fills your new tab with powerful basketball quotes. Elevate your browsing experience and let the wisdom of the court guide your online journey. 
Install BasketBoost now and unlock a new level of motivation each time you open a new tab.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the BasketBoost extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://basketboostab.com/tos and Privacy Policy https://basketboostab.com/privacy

Note: BasketBoost new tab extension respects your privacy and does not collect any personal information.
